name: Nikola Svobodová
short_desc_en: Nikola studies Computer Science at CTU and Mathematics at MFF UK. Apart from that, Nikola has also research experience from an experimental biochemistry/molecular biology laboratory. Currently, she is responsible for the backend development of our products.
short_desc_cs: Nikola pracuje na vývoji backendu našich aplikací. Studuje Informatiku na FIT ČVUT a zároveň Obecnou matematiku na MFF UK. V minulosti pracovala jako researcher v laboratoři biochemie a molekulární biologie.
